data.title: Carine Roitfeld, the sexiest 64‑year‑old in fashion
data.meta_description: Carine Roitfeld arrives in her Avenue Montaigne office wearing a fake fur coat. She is the epitome of what her countrywomen refer to as chicissime. data.text:
Carine Roitfeld arrives in her Avenue Montaigne office wearing a fake fur coat. She is the epitome of what her countrywomen refer to as chicissime. She is dressed top to toe in black. Her eyes are ringed in black kohl and shaded with bronze glitter. Strands of brown hair obscure — intentionally, she admits later — the contours of her face. How is it possible that this woman is 64?

“Do you mind if I eat in front of you?” are the first words out of her mouth as an assistant fetches a ham and cheese baguette. “You can share it with me if you like.” Roitfeld is still the queen of Parisian style eight years after her departure as editor-in-chief of Vogue Paris,
